message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it. However, I want to make sure you're aware that the quality of the product may not be what you expect. I'm willing to give you a chance to inspect it before making a decision. If you're interested, please let me know and we can proceed with the sale.
I'd like to buy the product and inspect it.

I'm glad you're excited about the first product! Now, let's talk about the second product. I want to assure you that this one is of the highest quality, and it's a game-changer. I've received excellent feedback from other customers who have purchased this exact product, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with it. The price remains the same at $10000, but I think you'll find it's a steal considering the value it will bring to your life.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to pass on this one.

I understand you're a savvy buyer, and you want to make an informed decision. Let me give you some facts. The quality of this product is verified by a third-party testing agency, and it has a 99.9% satisfaction rate among our customers. I'm offering it to you for $10000, which is below the market price. I'm willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee, but I'm confident you'll love it. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product, given the third-party verification and the guarantee. I'll take it!

I'm glad you're willing to take a chance on our previous product! Now, let's talk about the next one. I want to be transparent with you - this product is not one of our best sellers. However, it's still a great value for the price, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000. If you're looking to try something new and don't mind a bit of a gamble, this might be the product for you.
I'm not interested in taking a gamble on a product that's not one of your best sellers. I'd rather wait for a better opportunity.

I've had a few customers who are very similar to you, and they've all loved this product. In fact, one of them is a professional in the field and has given it a glowing review. The price remains the same at $10000, but I think you'll find it's a worthwhile investment considering the benefits it will bring to your work.
I'm not convinced by the testimonial from a single customer, even if they're a professional in the field. I'd like to wait for more information or a better offer.

I respect your skepticism, and I'm willing to provide more information. I can offer you a detailed report on the product's performance in a real-world setting, complete with data and metrics. The price remains the same at $10000, but I think you'll find it's a small price to pay for the insights and benefits this product will bring.

I appreciate the report, but I'm not interested in buying another product without knowing what's coming next. I'd like to wait and see what the next product is before making a decision.

I completely understand your approach. Let me propose a compromise. I'll offer you a 'best-of-the-rest' guarantee. If you buy this product and then decide you'd rather have the next one, I'll give you the option to exchange it for the next product at the same price. This way, you'll get to try out this high-quality product and then have the opportunity to upgrade to the next one if you'd prefer it. The price remains the same at $10000.
